name: The Black Maple Anomaly
storyline:
As a detective working for the Department of Anomaly Investigations It is your job to Investigate the sites consumed by recent anomaly disturbances. These sites are consumed by Anomaly Bubbles and stuck in a realm or multiple realms between different planes. It is not known who or what creates these spheres of corruption but they are known to absorb random areas, buildings, or sometimes parts of towns, shifting the reality inside, sometimes leaving behind deadly horrors.

Descend to floors that not bound by reality, Get to the lobby and Attempt to close the rift to bring this building back into normalcy.
summary: Another Anomaly, Another Mission. It's your job to work your way down the floors of the Black Maple Motel, Keep track of the anomalies, and reach the Lobby to try and safely close the Anomaly that has enveloped the building.
